artist: Artist: Edwin Bennet; Artist: William Bennet
description: Six-sided pitcher with spout and twig handle, covered inside and out with mottled brown glaze; on the two side panels, figures of huntsmen and plant forms in relief. One huntsman carries a bow and arrow and the other, accompanied by a dog, carries a club. Lid missing.
markings: in black capitals impressed: [E. & W. Bennet, Canton Avenue, Baltimore, Md.]
title: Pitcher
